house_listing.house_description: Location plus value.1531 sqft+converted garage=1700 sqft! Convienant to all interstate hwys.Excellent schools, neighbors&community.New city park,deck,well,shed & fenced yard.Professionally landscaped. One of a kind, cul-de-sac!! Price reduced $3000 for quick sell!!!!
